description: A no-code builder that lets users design one-page Vue.js apps with drag-and-drop, AI-generated content, and export/deploy via GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Initialize Nuxt 3 Project
tasks.description: Create a new Nuxt 3 project named 'onepage-ai-builder' using plain CSS (no Tailwind). Run `npx nuxi init onepage-ai-builder` then install dependencies.

tasks.title: Install Dependencies
tasks.description: Install all necessary libraries for state management, drag and drop, Stripe, and Supabase.
commands: npm install pinia vue-draggable-next stripe stripe-js @supabase/supabase-js archiver

tasks.title: Setup Folder Structure
tasks.description: Create the folder structure for components, pages, server API routes, and generator templates.

tasks.title: Configure nuxt.config.ts
tasks.description: Add CSS, Pinia module, and runtime configuration for Supabase, Stripe, AI, and GitHub API keys.

tasks.title: Setup Supabase Auth
tasks.description: Integrate Supabase for email/password authentication. Add login and registration forms in login.vue.

tasks.title: Build Dashboard Editor
tasks.description: Create dashboard.vue with a sidebar for draggable blocks and a main area for the preview canvas.

tasks.title: Add AI Integration (ai.yo.help)
tasks.description: Create /server/api/ai.post.js to send prompts to ai.yo.help. Add 'Generate with AI' buttons beside editable text fields.

tasks.title: Stripe Payment Integration
tasks.description: Implement Stripe Checkout for subscriptions and add webhook handling in /server/api/stripe-webhook.post.js.

tasks.title: Project Save/Load
tasks.description: Save and load user projects as JSON via Supabase. Implement Save and Load buttons in the dashboard.

tasks.title: Export to ZIP
tasks.description: Implement /server/api/export.post.js to generate and zip a Tailwind-based Vue project using the user's project data.

tasks.title: GitHub Pages Integration
tasks.description: Add GitHub OAuth and use the API to deploy the generated project to GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Live Preview System
tasks.description: Add a live preview iframe in dashboard.vue that updates when users add or modify components.

tasks.title: Styling
tasks.description: Use plain CSS for the dashboard. Add custom styles to assets/css/main.css.

tasks.title: Deploy the App
tasks.description: Deploy to Vercel or Netlify. Configure environment variables for Supabase, Stripe, ai.yo.help, and GitHub.

tasks.title: Final Testing
tasks.description: Test login, AI suggestions, Stripe payments, project saving, export, and GitHub deploy.
